arts.ttl: Darren Yapi, Rafael Navarro score in second half to lead Rapids to 3-2 victory over San Diego
arts.sum: Darren Yapi and Rafael Navarro scored seven minutes apart in the second half to rally the Colorado Rapids to a 3-2 victory over expansion side San Diego FC on Saturday night. San Diego (4-2-2) pulled even early in the second half when Luca de la Torre used an assist from Chucky Lozano in the 50th minute to score for the second time in his first season.
